relation: SCSU offers a variety of things to do for fun!
I love it in the dorms!!! You get to meet so many new people!!
I haven't really found any academic rigor at SCSU. The professors I've are all good teachers for the courses.

Follow your dreams here at SCSU, it is easy and fun to do so! The campus is extremely easy to get around and there are many friendly and helpful people here that will make everything so much easier for you!

SCSU is an amazing school that I feel well connected with my fellow students and professors. They have a wide range of courses to chose from, which is awesome when it comes to picking next semesters schedule! I can absolutely say I love it here!!
pageTitle: St. Cloud State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

There is a few different options but when I attended school there 2007-2009 I wasn't impressed with the options. There is also a Subway and Dominos but I personally don't like either. The Dining Hall had a few different options like a salad bar and a sandwich station but nothing is great., 186873=Sober living...AA meetings. Great idea just not a big turn out back in 2004-2005.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Anyone and everyone. There are students from all over the world, many different backgrounds, and perspectives on life. I guarantee you will find someone just like you. Tips for prospective students SCSU is known for it's partying, and there is a lot of that going on at campus but stay focused and remember that you are in college to get an education for your future. You have the rest of your life to party so don't waste the money on tuition if you're not going to try. Bang for the buck The education is exactly what I would expect for what I pay. The price is very reasonable compared to other campus' around the area. All in all, you get what you work for. So if you want a great education and you work hard for it SCSU will offer it to you. But if you just want to get by and don't really care, that's what you'll get. Am enjoying being here The people on SCSU campus are great! Everybody always has a ton of energy and you can always find something to do. There are a lot of programs and different entertainment things to
